results.content: The tables to summarise the difference between different approaches are  really good, and it helped me understand that why I struggle with OOP (I learned POP many years ago). My only problem is that the tutor's accent a bit hard for me so it will take some time to get used to it, but that is not related to the course material. I would suggest to add subtitles to the videos.
